import { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' function Signup() { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('') const [role, setRole] = useState('player') const [error, setError] = useState('') const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const { signup } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (password !== confirmPassword) { return setError('Passwords do not match') } setError('') setLoading(true) try { const user = await signup(name, email, password, role) if (user.role === 'player') { navigate('/player/dashboard') } else { navigate('/admin/dashboard') } } catch (error) { setError(error.message) } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (
